Account Deletion Request (Starter)

Subject: Account Deletion Request — [Your Name] — [Account ID / Email]

To: [Company / Support / Data Controller]

I request deletion of my account and personal data associated with it, to the extent required/allowed by applicable law and your obligations.

Identifiers:

  • Name: [Name]
  • Email(s): [Email]
  • Account ID: [ID]
  • Relevant services/products: [Optional]
  • Time range: [Optional]

Please confirm: 1) Whether deletion has been completed, and what data (if any) must be retained (and why). 2) The retention period for any retained data and the legal/policy basis. 3) That third-party processors acting on your behalf have been instructed accordingly.

Preferred response: written confirmation by email.

Regards, [Name] [Country]
